mapper.select:
SELECT t1.member_set_id memberId, t1.member_set_name memberName, t1.member_set_money memberSetMoney, t2.* FROM busi_member_set t1 LEFT JOIN busi_res_rebate_set t2 ON t1.member_set_id = t2.member_set_id
AND t2.res_id = #{resId} AND t2.res_type=#{resType}
AND t2.res_id =0 AND t2.res_type='KC'
AND t2.res_id =0 AND t2.res_type='KC'
WHERE t1.member_set_status = '1'
